name: Overachiever: Mini time waster games
description:
Overachiever: Mini games is a pack of simple to play old-school arcade games. Wanna feel like kids in 90s did? Wanna go back in the 90s and play those arcades? Then try out Overachiever: Mini games.

How to Play:
In menu click Play button. Then choose a game to play. At first most of games will be locked. To unlock a game you must play previous one and achieve at least one star. You can choose between Flying copter, Pixel cart, 100 balls style game, Pop the corn, Poke an alien, Avoid blades. More games will be added in the future.

Features:
• pixel art
• 8bit background music
• retro feel
• simple to play
• addictive

Developing quality apps and games like Overachiever: Mini games requires months of effort and dedication. To keep the development going and to recover our cost, this game uses ads for monetization. However, this game will not install any ad-related search bars on your phone or place ads in your notification bar.

If you like Overachiever: Mini games, please give us a rate and review.
